meanings.sent1: The extra pencils were unneeded in the classroom.
meanings.sent2: The unneeded decorations were removed from the party venue.
meanings.sent3: The unneeded umbrella was brought along on a sunny day for fun.
meanings.sent4: Her unneeded worries weighed on her like a heavy burden.
meanings.sent5: The unneeded clutter in the room made it hard to find anything.

meanings.sent1: The unneeded ingredients were left out of the recipe.
meanings.sent2: His unneeded comments only added confusion to the discussion.
meanings.sent3: She carried the unneeded bag around just for the sake of fashion.
meanings.sent4: The unneeded noise in the background made it hard to concentrate.
meanings.sent5: The unneeded expenses drained their savings unexpectedly.
